title: Establishes an exemption from the tax on sales and the compensating use tax for labor used to maintain, service, repair or improve historic real property
summary: Establishes an exemption from the tax on sales and the compensating use tax for labor used to maintain, service, repair or improve historic real property.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing an exemption from the tax on sales and the compensating use tax for labor used to improve historic real property
